column4: hey everyone.  I'm having problems with a third party deb package installed with gdebi that was supposed to give 6th gen iPod support to gtkpod.
seems like you should talk to the developers of that deb
: should pull it out.. I think dkpg -f might be useful, but am not sure
dpkg -r did the trick!  Was able to install the older package afterwards.  Thanks!
